creator: HUMAX Co., Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Introducing Humax AURA – The Heart of Home Entertainment
Enhance your TV viewing experience at no extra cost with the Humax Aura app.
Download the Humax Aura app to a compatible smart device and stream Live TV and your recordings around the house. Set reminders and schedule recordings right from the app or download recorded shows straight to your device to take with you on the go.
Set up is simple – Make sure both your Humax Aura STB and smart device are connected to the same WiFi network and follow the on-screen app instructions.

Features
Here’s a quick feature overview we’d love for you to check out:

When connected to the same WiFi network as your box
• Stream live TV straight to your smart device
• Browse the channel guide whilst watching live TV
• Watch simultaneously on up to 2 smart devices
• Download recordings from your box

With an active data connection
• Access the 7-day TV Guide and see programme descriptions
• Remotely schedule recordings or reminders
• Check the status of recordings on your box whenever, wherever
• Search via keywords

Even without WiFi
• Watch downloaded recordings on your smart device

[Notes]
Humax AURA app is optimised for Android and iOS devices, requires Android 6.0 or later, iOS 10 or later and is compatible with the Humax AURA Set Top Box only.
AURA app works on 3G/4G/5G and Wi-Fi network, performance may vary based on network environment.
Registration to myHumax.net is required to access TV Guide, Schedules and Recordings.

appDetails.developerAddress: HUMAX village, 11-4, Sunae-dong, Bundang-gu, Seongnam-si, Gyengggi-do, 463-875, KOREA

appDetails.developerAddress: HUMAX village, 11-4, Sunae-dong, Bundang-gu, Seongnam-si, Gyengggi-do, 463-875, KOREA
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Improvements:
- Added support for recorded content and live channels to stream to other Chromecast or DLNA rendering devices
- Added search function to recordings library
- Instant-sync for remote scheduling/recording when smart device and STB are connected to the same network
- Added playing video with aspect ratio 4:3 and 16:9
Bug fixes:
- Fixed re-registration requirement every time the app was opened when connection is set up manually
- Clear internal memory when deleting downloaded content

appDetails.developerAddress: HUMAX village, 11-4, Sunae-dong, Bundang-gu, Seongnam-si, Gyengggi-do, 463-875, KOREA
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Improvements:
- Includes stability and performance improvements
- Added function to hide channel in TV Guide / On Now
- Added playback support for recording casting within transcoded sections
- Changed order of TV Guide in menu side to be the first screen when opening the app
- Added information about enabling the function when DLNA option is not enabled on STB
- Changed wording for mobile and STB connection description
Bug fixes:
- Fixed sometimes cannot load guide of some channels in TV Guide.
